fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Prepare your tools tonight, giving another use of your second ability.
- Select three targets at night. Take the first half (rounded down) of a random ability from the first player, the last half (rounded up) of a random ability from the second player, and combine them. Then give that as a new ability to your third target. (0 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot self-target.
- You can never select a player more than once.
